topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5524f77a6368723427960400#post_5524f77a6368723427960400
Personally I dont think that justifys the activities in those riots at all. Pretty sure the guys who got their buildings and property firebombed werent involved, so yeah. Not siding with the rioters there.

One thing i have to wonder though, and I legitametly ask this. If ferguson had been any other combination. Asian man shot latino. Black man shot black man. Latino man kills black man. Black man kills latino. ANY other combination than a white man shooting a black man, would people care?  

I dont mean that in a " oh your cause is meaningless" way, i honestly wonder.


Edit: oh yeah and as for the recent video. Why would you shoot an unarmed guy 7 times?
